LanguageData.RGK_SimpleResearchBench.label: simple research bench
LanguageData.RGK_SimpleResearchBench.description: A simple bench with writing implements and simple measurement devices. Researchers work here to discover new things.
LanguageData.RGK_SimpleResearchBench_Blueprint.label: simple research bench (blueprint)
LanguageData.RGK_SimpleResearchBench_Frame.label: simple research bench (building)
LanguageData.RGK_SimpleResearchBench_Frame.descriptio: A simple bench with writing implements and simple measurement devices. Researchers work here to discover new things.
LanguageData.RGK_FueledStove.label: fueled stove
LanguageData.RGK_FueledStove.description: A wood-fueled stove with an attached countertop for preparing meals.
LanguageData.RGK_FueledStove_Blueprint.label: fueled stove (blueprint)
LanguageData.RGK_FueledStove_Blueprint_Install.label: fueled stove (blueprint)
LanguageData.RGK_FueledStove_Frame.label: fueled stove (building)
LanguageData.RGK_FueledStove_Frame.description: A wood-fueled stove with an attached countertop for preparing meals.
LanguageData.GL_ElectricStove.label: electric stove
LanguageData.GL_ElectricStove.description: A electric stove with an attached countertop for preparing meals.
LanguageData.GL_ElectricStove_Blueprint.label: electric stove (blueprint)
LanguageData.GL_ElectricStove_Blueprint_Install.label: electric stove (blueprint)
LanguageData.GL_ElectricStove_Frame.label: electric stove (building)
LanguageData.GL_ElectricStove_Frame.description: A electric stove with an attached countertop for preparing meals.
LanguageData.GL_Bonfire.label: bonfire
LanguageData.GL_Bonfire.description: Cooks meals and produces heat, and burns out after a few days. As with all heat sources, it must be placed indoors so it has a closed space to heat. Refuelable.
LanguageData.GL_Bonfire_Blueprint.label: bonfire (blueprint)
LanguageData.GL_Bonfire_Blueprint_Install.label: bonfire (blueprint)
LanguageData.GL_Bonfire_Frame.label: bonfire (building)
LanguageData.GL_Bonfire_Frame.description: Cooks meals and produces heat, and burns out after a few days. As with all heat sources, it must be placed indoors so it has a closed space to heat. Refuelable.
LanguageData.GL_HandTailoringBench.label: hand tailor bench
LanguageData.GL_HandTailoringBench.description: A workbench for tailoring clothes by hand. Works at 50% of the speed of an electric tailoring bench.
LanguageData.GL_HandTailoringBench_Blueprint.label: hand tailor bench (blueprint)
LanguageData.GL_HandTailoringBench_Frame.label: hand tailor bench (building)
LanguageData.GL_HandTailoringBench_Frame.description: A workbench for tailoring clothes by hand. Works at 50% of the speed of an electric tailoring bench.
LanguageData.GL_ElectricTailoringBench.label: electric tailor bench
LanguageData.GL_ElectricTailoringBench.description: A workbench with a sewing machine for rapid tailoring of clothes. Can work without electricity at 50% of normal speed.
LanguageData.GL_ElectricTailoringBench_Frame.label: electric tailor bench (building)
LanguageData.GL_ElectricTailoringBench_Frame.descript: A workbench with a sewing machine for rapid tailoring of clothes. Can work without electricity at 50% of normal speed.
LanguageData.GL_FueledSmithy.label: fueled smithy
LanguageData.GL_FueledSmithy.description: A wood-fueled station for smithing non-mechanical weapons and tools.
LanguageData.GL_FueledSmithy_Blueprint.label: fueled smithy (blueprint)
LanguageData.GL_FueledSmithy_Blueprint_Install.label: fueled smithy (blueprint)
LanguageData.GL_FueledSmithy_Frame.label: fueled smithy (building)
LanguageData.GL_FueledSmithy_Frame.description: A wood-fueled station for smithing non-mechanical weapons and tools.
LanguageData.GL_ElectricSmithy.label: electric smithy
LanguageData.GL_ElectricSmithy.description: An electric-powered station for smithing non-mechanical weapons and tools.
LanguageData.GL_ElectricSmithy_Blueprint.label: electric smithy (blueprint)
LanguageData.GL_ElectricSmithy_Frame.label: electric smithy (building)
LanguageData.GL_ElectricSmithy_Frame.description: An electric-powered station for smithing non-mechanical weapons and tools.
